name: Meow! - AR Cat&Your Mini Pet
description:
PLAY WITH YOUR OWN CAT
- Choose different hair coat, wearing all kinds of clothes
- Use different toys to attract its attention
- Feed it with all kinds of cat food
- Share its snapshots and videos with your family and friends
- Stroke cat, it will feel comfortable
- Long press cat and carry it to the position you want

TRAIN YOUR OWN CAT
- Train your cat with voice in trainning room
- Talk to it without tapping any button, it will respond to you
- Call its name, it will get close to you

COMING
- Photo album for you and your cat
- Diary system

IMPORTANT, YOU MUST OWN ONE OF THE FOLLOWING:
-iPhone6s、iphone6sP、iphone7、iphone7P、iPhone X

-Google Pixel，Pixel XL，Pixel 2，Pixel 2 XL
-Samsung S7，S7 Edge，S8，S8+，S9，Note 8
-LG V30，V30+
-One Plus 5
-Asus Zenfone 

FAQ
- How do I use the laser pointer?
Answer: Press the laser pointer icon, it appears after you press the laser pointer, you can use it to play with your cat.

CONTACT US
- Just email us via info@innovis.io if you have any ideas, suggestions, or bugs, thank you!
- Welcome to join in our Facebook group 'Meow - AR Cat' so that we can talk more about it!
